participant_1.background:
I'm not really a gym person, but I go for walks every day with my cats.
i work at a bookstore.
I filmed a documentary about a group of people who were following their dreams and it was an amazing experience.
I learned how to use augmented reality to create immersive learning experiences for my students.
my wife has terminal cancer.

participant_2.background:
I'm moving to a new city to pursue my culinary dreams.
i am a marathon runner.
i like to sing broadway show tunes.
I knit myself a sweater that is so warm and comfy, and it also helps me fight my sweet tooth because I'm too busy knitting to eat gummy worms!
My sister is a teacher, and my niece and nephew are still in school.

content.text: Hello! How are you doing today?
Good! I just moved to a new city to pursue my culinary dreams. What about you?
I am doing well! I work at a bookstore and I'm learning how to use augmented reality to create immersive learning experiences for my students.
That's really cool! I love augmented reality, it's so cool how it can be used to make things seem more real.
Yeah, I agree! It's really amazing. What are your hobbies?
I'm a marathon runner and I love to sing broadway show tunes.
That's awesome! I'm not really a gym person, but I go for walks every day with my cats.
That's great! I love cats. My sister is a teacher and she has a cat named Mittens.
Aww, that's cute! My cats are named Mittens and Snowball.
I love that! I'm sure they're both adorable.
Thanks! I think so too. They're my best friends.
I can imagine! I love animals so much.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I knit myself a sweater that is so warm and comfy, and it also helps me fight my sweet tooth because I'm too busy knitting to eat gummy worms!
That's so cool! I've always wanted to learn how to knit.
It's not that hard! There are a lot of great tutorials online.
Maybe I'll check it out sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun
